bulkLoadInsert.command: insert into sales_fact (product_sk, customer_sk, employee_sk, supplier_sk, sales_channel_sk, promotion_sk, booking_date, sales_date, delivery_date, priceBeforeDiscount, priceAfterDiscount, saleCosts) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

sqlStatements.insertSingle: insert into date_dim(dateMMDDYYYY, date_val, day_of_week, month_num, year_num) values ('${salesDate}', DATE(STR_TO_DATE('${salesDate}', '%m/%d/%Y')), DAYOFWEEK(STR_TO_DATE('${salesDate}', '%m/%d/%Y')), MONTH(STR_TO_DATE('${salesDate}', '%m/%d/%Y')), YEAR(STR_TO_DATE('${salesDate}', '%m/%d/%Y')))
sqlStatements.selectSurrogateKey: select date_sk from date_dim where dateMMDDYYYY='${salesDate}'

sqlStatements.insertSingle: insert into date_dim(dateMMDDYYYY, date_val, day_of_week, month_num, year_num) values ('${deliveryDate}', DATE(STR_TO_DATE('${deliveryDate}', '%m/%d/%Y')), DAYOFWEEK(STR_TO_DATE('${deliveryDate}', '%m/%d/%Y')), MONTH(STR_TO_DATE('${deliveryDate}', '%m/%d/%Y')), YEAR(STR_TO_DATE('${deliveryDate}', '%m/%d/%Y')))
sqlStatements.selectSurrogateKey: select date_sk from date_dim where dateMMDDYYYY='${deliveryDate}'

sqlStatements.insertSingle: insert into date_dim(dateMMDDYYYY, date_val, day_of_week, month_num, year_num) values ('${dateMMDDYYYY}', DATE(STR_TO_DATE('${dateMMDDYYYY}', '%m/%d/%Y')), DAYOFWEEK(STR_TO_DATE('${dateMMDDYYYY}', '%m/%d/%Y')), MONTH(STR_TO_DATE('${dateMMDDYYYY}', '%m/%d/%Y')), YEAR(STR_TO_DATE('${dateMMDDYYYY}', '%m/%d/%Y')))
sqlStatements.selectSurrogateKey: select date_sk from date_dim where dateMMDDYYYY='${dateMMDDYYYY}'
select employee_sk from employee_dim where employee_name='${employeeName}' and employee_id=${employeeId}
sqlStatements.preCacheKeys: select employee_sk, employee_name, employee_id from employee_dim

sqlStatements.insertSingle: insert into customer_dim(customer_name, customer_address, customer_country, customer_phone) values ('${customerName}','${customerAddress}','${customerCountry}','${customerPhone}')
sqlStatements.selectSurrogateKey: select customer_sk from customer_dim where customer_name='${customerName}' and customer_address='${customerAddress}' and customer_country='${customerCountry}' and customer_phone='${customerPhone}'
sqlStatements.preCacheKeys: select customer_sk, customer_name, customer_address, customer_country, customer_phone from customer_dim

sqlStatements.insertSingle: insert into product_dim(product_name, product_model, product_category, product_cost) values ('${productName}', '${productModel}', '${productCategory}', '${productCost}')
sqlStatements.selectSurrogateKey: select product_sk from product_dim where product_name='${productName}' and product_model='${productModel}' and product_category='${productCategory}' and product_cost='${productCost}'
sqlStatements.preCacheKeys: select product_sk, product_name, product_model, product_category, product_cost from product_dim

sqlStatements.selectSurrogateKey: select supplier_sk from supplier_dim where supplier_name='${supplierName}'
select sales_channel_sk from sales_channel_dim where sales_channel_name='${salesChannelName}'
select promotion_sk from promotion_dim where promotion_name='${promotionName}' and discount_pct=${discountPCT}
sqlStatements.preCacheKeys: select promotion_sk, promotion_name, discount_pct from promotion_dim
